sqllib.sql: select distinct set_chain from gc_assembly_set where tax_id=?
select distinct set_chain from gc_assembly_set where scientific_name like ?

SELECT gs.set_chain, gs.set_version, gs.scientific_name, gs.common_name, gs.tax_id, gs.name, gp.project_title, gp.strain FROM gc_assembly_set gs, (SELECT set_chain, MAX(set_version) AS set_version FROM gc_assembly_set gsv WHERE set_chain=? GROUP BY set_chain ) gc, gc_assembly_set_project gsp, gc_project gp WHERE gs.set_chain =gc.set_chain AND gs.set_version = gc.set_version AND gs.set_acc =gsp.set_acc AND gp.project_acc =gsp.project_acc
select gr.replicon_acc from gc_assembly_set gas join gc_replicon gr on (gr.set_acc=gas.set_acc) where gr.replicon_acc is not null and gas.set_chain=? and gas.set_version=? order by gr.replicon_order
select gr.acc from gc_assembly_set gas join gc_unplaced gr on (gr.set_acc=gas.set_acc) where gas.set_chain=? and gas.set_version=?
select gr.acc from gc_assembly_set gas join gc_unlocalised gr on (gr.set_acc=gas.set_acc) where gas.set_chain=? and gas.set_version=?
select wgs.prefix||lpad(wgs.version,2,0)||'%' from gc_assembly_set gas join gc_wgs_set wgs on (wgs.set_acc=gas.set_acc) where gas.set_chain=? and gas.set_version=?
select dbe.primaryacc#||'.'||bs.version from dbentry@ENAPRO.ENA_READER dbe join bioseq@ENAPRO.ENA_READER bs on (bioseqid=seqid) where dbe.primaryacc# like ? AND dbe.statusid=4 and dbe.entry_type!=8

select dbe.primaryacc#||'.'|bs.version from gc_assembly_set gas join gc_wgs_set wgs on (wgs.set_acc=gas.set_acc) join dbentry@ENAPRO.ENA_READER dbe on (dbe.primaryacc# like wgs.prefix||lpad(wgs.version,2,0)||'%') join bioseq@ENAPRO.ENA_READER bs on (bioseqid=seqid) where gas.set_chain=? and gas.set_version=? and dbe.statusid=4 and dbe.entry_type!=8
select nvl(sum(cnt),0) cnt from FEATURE_STATS@ENAPRO.ENA_READER join cv_fkey@ENAPRO.ENA_READER using (fkeyid) where acc=? and fkey='CDS'
select nvl(sum(ss.cds_cnt+ss.contig_1_cds_cnt+ss.contig_2_cds_cnt),0) cnt from gc_wh_sequence_stats ss where ss.acc=?
